causes.title: The causes that matter for me

spa.title: SPA
reasons: The French SPA (Society for the Protection of Animals) is a charitable organization that has the mission of protecting animals and fighting against cruelty towards them. I love the French SPA because it provides valuable assistance to animals that need protection and care.

The French SPA works hard to ensure that animals are well-treated and protected against cruelty and abandonment. It offers services such as sterilization and vaccination to help control the animal population, as well as rehabilitation and reintegration programs for animals that have been mistreated or abandoned.

In addition to its efforts to protect animals, the French SPA also raises awareness about animal welfare and teaches people how to care for their four-legged companions responsibly. This helps to create a more just and respectful society for animals, which is important to me.

As an animal lover, I am grateful to the French SPA for its crucial work in protecting and supporting animals. I am proud to support this organization and contribute to its efforts to improve the lives of animals in our society.

resto.title: Restorants du Coeur
reasons: The cause of the restos du Coeur is very important to me because I have seen the effects of poverty and financial hardship firsthand. As a child, my parents had to face financial difficulties and we had to rely on the restos du Coeur to be able to eat for a period of time. This experience showed me how important it is to ensure that everyone has access to healthy and nutritious food.

The restos du Coeur provide valuable assistance to those in need by providing hot and nutritious meals for free. They are a source of support for people who are struggling to make ends meet and who would not be able to afford food otherwise.

In addition to their work in helping to feed those in need, the restos du Coeur are also a force for solidarity and mutual aid in communities. They create a place where people can gather and support each other, which can have a positive impact on the emotional and social well-being of those who benefit from it.

In summary, the cause of the restos du Coeur is important to me because it ensures that those in need have access to nutritious food and creates opportunities for solidarity and mutual aid in communities.

privacy.title: Privacy
reasons: Privacy is important to me because it represents the right of each individual to have a personal space and to be protected from unwanted intrusions. This means that everyone has the right to decide who can access their personal information and how it can be used.

Privacy is also important in preserving the dignity and integrity of each individual. When we are protected from unwanted intrusions, we can feel safe and comfortable expressing ourselves freely without fear of being judged or exploited.

In addition, privacy is crucial in protecting individual freedoms and ensuring that individuals can live autonomously and freely. When our privacy is violated, we can feel vulnerable and powerless, which can have a negative impact on our well-being and personal growth.
Ultimately, privacy is essential for every individual to live a free and dignified life. That's why it's important to protect this personal space and respect the privacy rights of others.

me.description: I'm a web developper. I am passionate about web development and innovation.

openness.title: openness
openness.description: I am open to new experiences and new ideas. I am curious and enjoy learning new things.

quality.title: Qualité
quality.description: I strive to do my best in everything I do. I am proud of my work and committed to delivering quality products. I am always looking for new ways to improve my skills and knowledge, whether it be in tools or languages.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: I am creative and enjoy finding innovative solutions to problems. I am always looking for new ideas and ways of doing things. I enjoy creating things and am proud of my imagination. I appreciate seeing my ideas come to life and watching my creations come to life.

honesty.title: Honnêteté
honesty.description: I am honest and committed to being transparent and keeping my promises. I am trustworthy and proud of my integrity. I appreciate both telling the truth and hearing it, whether it is positive or negative.

description: During this professional experience, I worked with technologies such as React, NodeJS, GraphQL, and MongoDB to develop applications for the insurance sector. I also learned many new skills and progressed within a growing team. I helped junior developers in transition get onboarded at the company and participated in the restructuring of the company which went from less than ten employees to around 50. This professional experience allowed me to develop my technical skills and work in a constantly evolving environment. I also contributed to the growth and development of the company by supporting junior developers and participating in the restructuring of the company.

During this professional experience, I learned to code in C# to work on the development of a virtual printer application for the dematerialization of documents for businesses. My main tasks included creating a system around emails to ensure the traceability of email delivery by managing bounces, as well as integrating electronic signatures for documents into the printer's workflow. I also worked with JavaScript by developing a scrapping system that allowed me to retrieve invoices from ISP portals. This professional experience allowed me to develop my skills in native application development and data processing from websites.

During this short professional experience, I discovered Meteor.js and began learning ReactJS. I was responsible for integrating the tracking of washing machines with the goal of having almost real-time information. This was an enriching experience as it was my first experience in the NodeJS world and it was therefore a kind of revelation about my affection for the JS world and real-time applications. This experience allowed me to discover new technologies and strengthen my web development skills.

This experience at Solicis was challenging as I began to delve deeper into my knowledge of PHP in order to integrate a showcase website for a real estate agency. It used the Zend framework. However, I did not particularly enjoy this experience, which confirms my lack of appetite for PHP. Although this experience allowed me to develop my skills in PHP, I realized that it is not a technology that particularly interests me.

This experience took place in Paris, at MeilleureSCPI, a company that manages access to real estate investment through SCPI. I began working with PHP in the context of a legacy framework and also developed components in Vue.js 2. This also allowed me to learn Bootstrap and work as a team with Git. This experience gave me the opportunity to develop my skills in PHP and web development, as well as work with modern technologies.

projects.title: If you want to see more, you still can go on <0>my $t(social.github)</0>

bellz.title: Bellz
description: Bellz is a personal accounting management application that helps individuals better manage their finances. It lists transactions and accounts in an organized manner, facilitating financial decision making. The application also allows users to share this information with others, which can be useful when working as a couple or as a family. Available as a web service, Bellz allows users to track their accounting from anywhere and at any time. By using this application, individuals can more efficiently and effectively reach their financial goals.

This application was built around Remix to learn how to use this framework as well as learn some optimization techniques to reduce loading time and make the application as fast as possible. It was designed to allow for JavaScript-free use on the front-end as well as in highly degraded network conditions.
It also allowed me to create a project foundation based on Remix, TailwindCSS, and Revolut in order to have a complete and performant SaaS service template.

deadsafe.title: The DeadSafe
description: The DeadSafe is an ambitious decentralized management game project based on NFTs whose goal is to unlock access to a safe.
DeadSafe is in the process of being created.

basemint.title: BaseMint
description: The Basemint project is a fan art whose goal is to learn about using web3 and interacting with an Ethereum contract. In this case, the contract is for VirtueAnimation's BaseMint Buds NFT.
I was able to learn how to display the basic information of a contract and interact with it through JavaScript.

andromeda.title: Andromeda
description: Andromeda is an application designed to help developers better manage their time and remember what they accomplished the previous day. It offers an easy-to-use Kanban interface that allows developers to track their work day and recall what they accomplished during their Daily. This application is developed in Meteor with React and uses MongoDB as its database. It enables developers to better organize their work and track their progress effectively.
I was able to take advantage of creating this application to work on an interface that provides a visual state of things through page animations.

styx.title: Styx
description: Styx is a customer management application for crematoriums, it simply allows managing the deceased and associated information.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.name: Your name
contact.subject: The subjet of your message
contact.captcha_label: Due to too many spams, I ask you to fill in this simple captcha in order to be able to send your message. Thank you for your understanding.

workingValues.title: Some values in work that are dear to me

pride.title: Pride
pride.description: I believe that achieving something well-made and clean is a source of pride and motivation. The very idea of being able to show what I have done and being able to talk about it with pride is one of the driving forces behind my work. I believe that digital creations are things whose realization brings something to others.

kindness.title: Kindness
kindness.description: Learning is a long journey. Everyone learns at their own pace. Everyone has something to learn from others. I prefer to assume that the people I interact with have something to offer me. This helps me to stay open, to offer my help while learning from my interlocutors.
